title: Number of Carnival Corporation & plc passengers worldwide 2007 to 2019
summary: In general Number of passengers in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of passengers in millions is roughly constant from 2013 to 2015, slightly increasing from 2015 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Maximum Number of passengers in millions, about 12.4 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Number of passengers in millions about 10.06 was reached at Year 2013
